attributes.additional_details: After seing the riots the last few day I am one of many who are saying we should bring National service back in some form many of these rioters gave the reason they had no money  even though  many  wore label clothing they could not find jobs and had no future I therefore feel National serve would get them off streets and instill much needed discipline which they do not have I love bing British I am a very proud Salfordian and love my City it broke my watching wha these thugs were doing where I grew up we need something done now because they are winning they say police cannot touch them they have no fear of authority please make Britain GREAT again Thank you
